summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Roosevelt Heights 2nd Addition, and same produced across unplatted property, being the alley between 34th Avenue Northeast and 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 68th Street to East 70th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14163 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
